alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Racine; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:41AM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible near the lake and 5 to 9 inches further inland. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Kenosha; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Racine; Walworth; Waukesha
